attributes.action: Let low risk prisoners and ipp prisoners come home so there safe from covid19
attributes.additional_details: Prisons are full they're unsafe. It's impossible to protect prisoners from covid19 when prisons are so full and prison staff are reduced because of covid19. I feel prisoners should temporarily be allowed home with there family's.
attributes.background: It's unfare families of prisoners can't see prisoners its also unfare how there more at risk from covid19. Low risk prisoners and ipp prisoners should be allowed to come home temporarily to assure their safety

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305604

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
